messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Father's Garden India, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, not more than 15 energy draining parasites have migrated into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a horde of energy draining parasites have migrated into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Father's Garden India's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
